flawed_nl_solution:
He can lift 135+265=<<135+265=400>>400 pound without the bracer
The bracer adds 400*6=<<400*6=24000>>24000 pounds
So he can now squat 24000+400=<<24000+400=24400>>24400 pounds
#### 24400

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 24000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
